{{Description|"Theoretically, a rectangular blast would be most efficient at destroying enemy formations. Unfortunately, the cross-section of an explosive shock wave is round, like most cakes. So, the secondary explosive shells can only be arranged like the fruit on a cake, forming a ring around the edge.}}
'''Ring of Bursting Grenades''' is [[Chevreuse]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Secondary Explosive Shell DMG will knock enemies towards the center of the Explosive Grenade blast.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|The Secret to Rapid-Fire Multishots}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Enhanced Incendiary Firepower}}
